pr_title: add test case for AADB2COidcLoginConfigurer OAuth2 Additional Parameters

timeline.body:
The following 2 style is better:

1. AUTHENTICATE_ADDITIONAL_PARAMETERS_LOGIN_HINT = AUTHENTICATE_ADDITIONAL_PARAMETERS + "." + PROMPT
2. AUTHENTICATE_ADDITIONAL_PARAMETERS_LOGIN_HINT = ".authenticate-additional-parameters.prompt".

I prefer 2.
timeline.bodyText:
The following 2 style is better:

AUTHENTICATE_ADDITIONAL_PARAMETERS_LOGIN_HINT = ".authenticate-additional-parameters.prompt".

I prefer 2.
